moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nc3 Nc6 3. f4: Lange begins with the Vienna Gambit.
moves.3... exf4 4. Nf3 g5 5. Bc4 g4 6. O-O: A Muzio Gambit, a very risky line [against an opponent of equal strength] with the piece sacrifice.
moves.8... Kxf7 9. Qh5+ Kg7 10. Rxf4: If any of Lange's pieces could checkmate, Black would be in serious trouble. However, it must be the lone remaining White Knight.
moves.10... Nh6 11. Be3 d6 12. Ne2: Moving the Knight closer to its target.
moves.12... Qe7 13. Kxg2 Be6 14. Raf1: Lange's plan is to chop away the King's defenses with his other pieces before moving the Knight in for the kill.
moves.14... Bf7 15. Qxh6+ Kxh6 16. Rg4+ Kh5: The King is being forced away from his supporting troops.
moves.17. Ng3+ Kxg4 18. Rf5: Trapping the King in the danger zone.
